benefits.name: Overcome Defenses
benefits.description: The Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage you deal always ignores Resistance.

benefits.name: Overwhelming Strike
benefits.description: When you roll a 20 on the d20 for an attack roll, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to the ability score increased by this feat. The extra damage's type is the same as the attack's type.
